changes.change: - Fixed the annoying passcode screen bug.
- Fixed the black passcode screen background.
- Forced today view to appear for the tweak to work normally.
- Fixed iOS 13.3 and older compatibility problem with the tweak.
- Fixed a problem with Notification Center unable to exit on iPhone X and newer models using normal swipe up gesture.
- Added a new Tweak Preferences in Settings, which allows users to customize the slide text, color, and other settings.
- Hide Lockscreen Quick Actions and Home Bar properly on iPhone X and later.
- Removed the "slide to unlock" text and put back the Today View in Notification Center.
- Added an iOS 9 lock sound option.
- Fixed compatibility issues with other tweaks.
